code: import'../App.css';import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FetchTickets(){const[tickets,setTickets]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:3000/Tickets/').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setTickets(data)).catch(err=>console.log(err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Ticket List"}),tickets.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No tickets available."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tickets.map(ticket=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["User: ",ticket.user]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Category: ",ticket.Category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Sub Category: ",ticket.Sub_Category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",ticket.Status]})]},ticket._id))})]});};export default FetchTickets;
